verbose_text: Our results demonstrate the robust loading of AZ7379 into liposomes and that AZ7379 delivered by PTP targeted liposomes not only enhanced PARP inhibition but also resulted in decelerated tumor growth in animals bearing OVCAR8 (high grade epithelial ovarian cancer (EOC)) tumors.
evidence: AZ7379 delivered by PTP-targeted liposomes not only enhanced PARP
